text: Agres ( ) is a town in the comarca of Comtat, in the province of Alicante, Valencian Community, Spain. It is situated between the Serra de Mariola and the Serra d'Agullent. It is bordered by Agullent, Benissoda and Albaida to the north; Muro d'Alcoi and Cocentaina to the east; Alfafara to the west and Alcoi to the south. == See also == * Serra Mariola Natural Park ==References== ==External links== * Índice de Estadística Municipal del municipio de Agres. title: Agres
